title: A demo of wireless electricity
description: Eric Giler wants to untangle our wired lives with cable-free electric power. Here, he covers what this sci-fi tech offers, and demos MIT's breakthrough version, WiTricity -- a near-to-market invention that may soon recharge your cell phone, car, pacemaker.
author: Eric Giler
keywords: TED, talks, engineering, entrepreneur, future, science, technology, infrastructure, electricity
